lead_paragraph: Central Park East I is proud of its spirit of total educational freedom, but simmering tensions among parents and staff members have erupted into a fight over the new principal.

headline.print_headline: School’s Vision Devolves  Into War in East Harlem
headline.main: East Harlem School’s Utopian Spirit Devolves Into War

snippet: Central Park East I is proud of its spirit of total educational freedom, but simmering tensions among parents and staff members have erupted into a fight over the new principal.
abstract: Arrival of new principal Monika Garg at Central Park East I elementary school in East Harlem causes tensions to erupt as parents and some teachers accuse her of bringing in families with little stake in school's future and forcing teacher to teach pre-packaged curricula; supporters argue Garg is trying to bring school back to its roots of serving children of East Harlem.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Central Park East I Elementary School (Manhattan, NY)
